Mkhululi Bhebhe (amụrụ n'abalị ise nke ọnwa Eprel afọ1984 na Bulawayo, Zimbabwe )  bụ onye na- agụ egwu ozioma nke oge a na Zimbabwe
N'afọ 2008, Bhebhe banyere ihe ngosi  arụsị ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndịda anyanwụ  nke mba
Aịksw nke e mere na Nairobi, Kenya, ma tinye nke isii
N'afọ 2009, Bhebhe malitere iso ndị otu egwu ozioma South Afrịka na-eme emume mmemmé aṅurị
Ọ bụrụla abụ ozi ọma nke Zimbabwe na mba ụwa, gụnyere Tambira Jehovah, Ichokwadi, Namata  na Wasara Wasara.
Bhebhe sonyeere otu mmemmé aṅurị a n' afọ 2010
N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2012, Bhebhe wepụtara abọ, iChokwadi nwere egwu iri na atọ, gụnyere "Thelumoya" na "Tambira Jehovah"
Dị ka nke afọ 2015 egwu Bhebhe kacha ewu ewu na mmemmé Ọñụ nke a akpọrọ "Tambira Jehovah"
N'afọ 2016 Bhebhe kpọpụtara mmemme ozi ọma nke Celestial Praiz afọ 2016
